column5: Coffee, a water bottle, and some snacks will be available for you.  Shampoo, toothpaste, iPhone charger, clean towels, and anything you would get at a very fancy hotel, you will have it here for a lower price! The area is safe, and the community is amazing.  15 min to Fort Hood. 5-7 from Shopping and food areas. Questions? Ask! We will work it out!
